api.switch.isOn: Determine whether the Switch is checked
api.switch.checkedChildren: The content to be shown when the state is checked
api.switch.unCheckedChildren: The content to be shown when the state is unchecked
api.switch.size: The size of the Switch, options: default regular, small
api.switch.onChange: Trigger when the checked state of Switch changes
token.switch.innerMaxMarginSM: Small size max margin of content area
token.switch.innerMinMarginSM: Small size min margin of content area
token.switch.trackHeightSM: Small size height of the track
token.switch.trackMinWidthSM: Small size min width of the track
token.switch.colorTextQuaternary: Text color quaternary (used for unchecked background)
token.switch.colorTextTertiary: Text color tertiary (used for hover unchecked background)
